alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 02 at 12:02PM PST until January 03 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High tide is predicted to be around 8.74 feet at Crescent City Harbor around 11 AM Monday morning, with up to a half-foot of tidal anomaly possible. Strong southerly winds and building westerly swell may result in enhanced wave run up at area beaches as well as ocean water washing up onto highway 101 south of Crescent City. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte County. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Waves washing up onto a few low-lying portions of highway 101 and some local roads close to the beaches.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
